docs.snippet: SAD TERMINATION OF A LONG LIFE.--A few evenings since, two Third Precinct Policemen discovered a very old man lying among a heap of rabbise, upon one of the docks near the Washington Market, in a fit. They convoyed him to the Stationhouse, where he...
docs.lead_paragraph: SAD TERMINATION OF A LONG LIFE.--A few evenings since, two Third Precinct Policemen discovered a very old man lying among a heap of rabbise, upon one of the docks near the Washington Market, in a fit. They convoyed him to the Stationhouse, where he died in agony a few minutes afterwards, though Police Surgeon KENNEDY was almost immediately present, and rendered all possible aid,

docs.snippet: We have advices from Europe one day later, by the arrival of the steamship Nova Scotian at Further Point, on her way to Quebec. She sailed from Liverpool on the 15th inst. There had been no further collision between the belligerent forces in Italy,...
docs.lead_paragraph: We have advices from Europe one day later, by the arrival of the steamship Nova Scotian at Further Point, on her way to Quebec. She sailed from Liverpool on the 15th inst. There had been no further collision between the belligerent forces in Italy, but the news is nevertheless quite important.

headline.main: LAW REPORTS.; COURT CALENDAR. SUPREME COURT UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT. SUPERIOR COURT COMMON PLEAS SURROGATE'S COURT.

headline.main: Steben Moument Association-Fes tival at Jones' Woods.

docs.lead_paragraph: A three-day's German Festival was begun yesterday in Jones' Woods, under the auspices of the Steuben Monument Association, the object, as set forth in the advertisement, being to aid the fund for the erection of a monument to Baron STEUBEN, of Revolutionary memory. The proceedings were under the management of the Steuben Central Committee' who have already some $3,000 in hand for this object:

headline.main: ONE DAY LATER FROM EUROPE.; Cotton quit and Unchanged...Beads Lower...Provisions Dull. The New British Cabinet Not Yet Announced. Consols 93 38@93 5-8. The Austrian Emperor to Assume Command in Person. NAPOLEON'S HEAD-QUARTERS AT GORGONZOLA. Advance of the Allies Across the Adda. Arriaval of the Nova Scotian. THE WAR IN ITALY. Their Evacuation of Bologna and Modena. The Austrians in Full Retreat Towards the River Oglio.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Nova Scotian, from Liverpool on Wednesday, the 15th inst., passed this point at 4 1/2 o'clock this afternoon, on her way to Quebec. The steamship North American, from Quebec 4th inst., arrived at Liverpool on the 14th, The steamship City of Baltimore, from New-York 4th inst., arrived at Queenstown on the 14th.

docs.snippet: ARRIVAL OF THE STEAMSHIP EMPIRE CITY. The Empire City Left New. Orleane at 8 A. M. on the 20th inst. and entered Havana harbor at sunrise on the 23d, embarked passengers, mails and fright, and left at 2 P. M. the same say for this part. Left in port...
docs.lead_paragraph: ARRIVAL OF THE STEAMSHIP EMPIRE CITY. The Empire City Left New. Orleane at 8 A. M. on the 20th inst. and entered Havana harbor at sunrise on the 23d, embarked passengers, mails and fright, and left at 2 P. M. the same say for this part. Left in port American steamer Galveston, from Propeller Commerce, from Baltimore, and British steamer Feriot, from st. Thomas.

headline.main: FROM THE RIVER FLATS.; Message of the President of Buenos Ayres--Public Education--Financial Improvement--The impending War--Dictator Lopez Ill--Changes in the Buenos Ayrean Ministry--Movements of Troops--Counter-Manifestos of the Argentine and Buenos Ayrean Governments.

docs.lead_paragraph: On the Ist inst. the legislature of this State was opened by Governor ALSINA in person. His Message, which is a straightforward and statesmanlike document, gives us a true account of the extraordinary advance of this country, the only point of South America which enjoys a truly Republican rule.

headline.main: FROM THE PACIFIC COAST.; Nicaragua Rejects the American Ultimatum. WARLIKE INDICATIONS FROM CENTRAL AMERICA. LATER FROM THE SANDWICH ISLANDS. Message of the President of Costa Rica. INTERESTING FROM CALIFORNIA Suppression of the Revolutions in Chili and Ecuador. WRECK OF AN ENGLISH SHIP. ARRIVAL OF THE MOSES TAYLOR, THE STEAMSHIP WASHINGTON AT PANAMA.. TWO MILLIONS IN TREASURE. Highly Interesting from the South Pacific.

docs.snippet: By the arrival of the screw-steamship Bremen, from Southampton, June 14, we have three days later from Europe. The war in Italy had assumed no new features. The Austrians had evacuated all the points held by them on the Po above Mantua, and were...
docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the screw-steamship Bremen, from Southampton, June 14, we have three days later from Europe. The war in Italy had assumed no new features. The Austrians had evacuated all the points held by them on the Po above Mantua, and were rapidly concentrating within their famous quadrangle. The troops heretofore retainedin the Legations were withdrawn;

docs.snippet: HEALTH COMMISSIONERS.--At the meeting of the Health Commissioners at noon yesterday a communication was received from KELTY BROTHERS  LONG, of No. 291 Broadway, complaining of a nuisance in the yards of Nos. 291 and 293 Broadway. It was referred to...
docs.lead_paragraph: HEALTH COMMISSIONERS.--At the meeting of the Health Commissioners at noon yesterday a communication was received from KELTY BROTHERS LONG, of No. 291 Broadway, complaining of a nuisance in the yards of Nos. 291 and 293 Broadway. It was referred to the City inspector. Mr. DELAVAN reported that the nuisances at No. 72 Third-street and No. 141 Clinton-street had been abated.
